inputs :$1 and $2
output : $5

LRI $0,0
1100-1000-0010-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000
C8200000

LII $0,0
1100-0100-0010-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000
C4200000

//reg1: r=2 , theta = 0.3926 (0.3906)
LRI $1,2
1100-1000-0010-0000-0000-0010-0000-0000
C8200200

LII $1,0.3926
1100-0100-0010-0000-0000-0000-0110-0100
C4200064

//reg2: r=1 , theta = 0.3926 (0.3906)
LRI $2,1
1100-1000-0100-0000-0000-0001-0000-0000
C8400100

LII $2,0.3926
1100-0100-0100-0000-0000-0000-0110-0100
C4400064

div(polar) $3,$1,$2
1011-0000-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000
B0611000

sw $3, $0, 0h
1101-0000-0110-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000
D0600000

dual $4,$3
1011-0100-1000-0011-0001-0000-0000-0000
B4831000

conv $5,$4
1011-1100-1010-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000
BCA41000

sw $5, $0, 4h
1101-0000-1010-0000-0000-0000-0000-0100
D0A00004
